data.title: Move to the beat
data.solution:
input()
s = input()

s = s.split()
x, y = 0, 0
for move in s:
    # LEFT to "ts"
    if move == "ts":
        x = max(0, x - 1)
    # RIGHT to "boom"
    if move == "boom":
        x = min(30, x + 1)
    # UP to "ding"
    if move == "ding":
        y = max(0, y - 1)
    # DOWN to "bing"
    if move == "bing":
        y = min(10, y + 1)

print(x, y)
data.statement: Nokk is in a disco. The dance floor is a grid space of size <<31 Ã— 11>> ({{31}} width, {{11}} height). Nokk moves to the beat and he goes LEFT to {{ts}}, RIGHT to {{boom}}, UP to {{ding}} and DOWN to {{bing}} . He enters the dance floor at (0, 0) - the upper left corner - and he can't move through walls. Where is Nokk when the music stops?

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Nokk is in a disco. The dance floor is a grid space of size 31 × 11 (31 width, 11 height). Nokk moves to the beat and he goes LEFT to ts, RIGHT to boom, UP to ding and DOWN to bing . He enters the dance floor at (0, 0) - the upper left corner - and he can't move through walls. Where is Nokk when the music stops?
Input
Line 1: n
Line 2: n space-separated words: boom, ts, ding, or bing
Output
One line giving Nokk's space-separated position X Y
Constraints
0 <= length of the string <= 10000
0 <= n <= 70
There will not be other words in line 2 than the four possibilities given in the statement.
Example
Input
3
boom boom ts
Output
1 0
